Package Controller

Class BookingManager

java.lang.Object
Controller.BookingManager
public class BookingManager extends Object
BookingManager is a control class which handles bookings by the user. BookingManager contains methods that allow users to select seats, calculate price of ticket, create a new booking and view bookings.
Since:
2022-11-06

  • Constructor Details

    • BookingManager

      public BookingManager()

  • Method Details

    • seatSelector

      public static String seatSelector(Model.SeatLayout layout)
      Selects seat from a specified seat layout. This method will display an error if the chosen seat is already taken and display a success message if the chosen seat has not been taken. When a seat is successfully booked, the specified seat will be marked as unavailable.
      Parameters:
      layout - the seating plan of the cinema during showtime.
      Returns:
      the row and column of the successfully booked seat.

    • printBooking

      public static void printBooking(Model.Booking booking)
      Prints the booking receipt of the transaction. Each receipt will contain details such as Transaction ID, Cineplex name, Seats booked, Movie name, Movie date and time, Total price paid and User details.
      Parameters:
      booking - the Booking to print the receipt for.

    • printBookingHist

      public static void printBookingHist(Model.BookingList bookingList, Model.Moviegoer user)
      Prints all the receipts of the Bookings in a specified booking list for a specified user.
      Parameters:
      bookingList - the booking list to print the receipts for.
      user - the user who made the bookings. Only bookings made by the specified user will be printed.

    • makeBooking

      public static void makeBooking(Model.CineplexList cList, Model.MovieList mList, Model.BookingList bList, Model.PublicHolidayList phl, Model.Moviegoer user, Model.TicketPrice tp) throws Exception
      Registers a new transaction made by a user. This method will allow the user to choose a Showtime and select seats from that Showtime. Price for each ticket will be calculated and its details will be displayed.
      Parameters:
      cList - the list of Cineplexes from the database.
      mList - the list of Movies from the database.
      bList - the list of Bookings from the database. A new Booking will be added to the Booking list if successful.
      phl - the list of Public Holidays from the database.
      user - the user who is making the booking.
      tp - the ticket price to calculate pricing.
      Throws:
      Exception - if seat chosen does not exist in the seating plan.

    • priceCalculator

      public static double priceCalculator(Model.Cinema cinema, Model.CinemaMovie movie, GregorianCalendar date, Model.PublicHolidayList phl, Model.TicketPrice tp, int SeatRow)
      Calculates the price of a ticket based on Cinema type, Movie type, Seat type, day of the week and age of user. This method will prompt user to input their age category.
      Parameters:
      cinema - the Cinema on the movie ticket.
      movie - the Movie on the ticket.
      date - the date of the movie.
      phl - the list of public holidays from the database.
      tp - the ticket price to calculate pricing.
      SeatRow - the row of the seat chosen. Premium seats are on rows 7 and 8.
      Returns:
      the final price of the ticket.
